81.heading: Topps Chewing Gum, Inc.
81.title: Jewish Mice, Bubblegum Cards, Comics Art, & Raw Possibilities : an interview with Art Spiegelman & Francoise Mouly ; conducted by Joey Cavalieri.
81.author: [No author]
notes: SUMMARY: Interview in three sessions, the first (Cavalieri/Spiegelman) before the publication of Raw #1, the second (Cavalieri/ Spiegelman/Mouly) before the publication of Raw #2, and the third (Cavalieri/Spiegelman/Mouly/Thompson/Groth) before the publication of Raw #3. Topics covered include Spiegelman's fan and underground work, editing Arcade the Comics Revue, his work and consultantship with Topps Bubble Gum, work for Playboy, the history of Maus, and the beginnings of Raw. 1. Spiegelman, Art
Interviews. 2. Arcade, the Comics Revue. 3. Underground comic books, strips, etc.

History and criticism. 4. Raw. 5. Topps Chewing Gum, Inc. 6. Maus. I. Spiegelman, Art. II. Cavalieri, Joey. III. Mouly, Francoise. IV. Thompson, Kim. V. Groth, Gary. VI. Comics Journal, no. 65. Call no.: PN6727.S6J4 1981. Call no.: PN6700.C62no.65
